00026 #include "rtopologicalfrontier.h"
00027 
00028 namespace RDK2 { namespace RMaps {
00029 
00030 RDK2_FACTORY(RTopologicalFrontier);
00031 RDK2_FACTORY(RTopologicalFrontierVector);
00032     
00033 using namespace std;
00034 
00035 RTopologicalFrontier::RTopologicalFrontier(double x0, double y0, double x1, 
00036                        double y1): point0(x0, y0), 
00037                                point1(x1, y1)
00038 {
00039     double deltaX, deltaY, l;
00040     midpoint.x = (x0 + x1) / 2;
00041     midpoint.y = (y0 + y1) / 2;
00042     deltaX = x1 - x0;
00043     deltaY = y1 - y0;
00044     l = sqrt(deltaX * deltaX + deltaY * deltaY);
00045     midpoint.theta = asin(deltaY / l) + M_PI / 2;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void RTopologicalFrontier::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00049 {
00050     w->startWriting(getClassName());
00051         w->write_f32(point0.x); w->write_f32(point0.y);
00052         w->write_f32(point1.x); w->write_f32(point1.y);
00053         w->write_f32(midpoint.x);   w->write_f32(midpoint.y);   w->write_f32(midpoint.theta);
00054     w->doneWriting();
00055 }
00056     
00057 void RTopologicalFrontier::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00058 {
00059     r->startReading(getClassName());
00060         point0.x = r->read_f32();   point0.y = r->read_f32();
00061         point1.x = r->read_f32();   point1.y = r->read_f32();
00062         midpoint.x = r->read_f32(); midpoint.y = r->read_f32(); midpoint.theta = r->read_f32();
00063     r->doneReading();
00064 }
00065 
00066 std::string RTopologicalFrontier::getStringForVisualization() const {
00067     ostringstream oss;
00068     oss << "(" << point0.toString() << ") - (" << midpoint.toString() << 
00069         ") - (" << point1.toString() << ")";
00070     return oss.str();
00071 }
00072 }} // namespace
